summary: Julia moves back to her childhood village to help a group of ecologists save a lake from an industrial project, but strange things start to happen as she must confront her deepest repressed secrets.
cast: Krista Kosonen|Kai Lehtinen|Viljami Nojonen|Peter Franzén|Risto Aaltonen|Kari Hietalahti|Ilkka Villi|Katriina Hyvärinen|Pentti Korhonen|Panu Vauhkonen|Karri Lämpsä|Riina Björkbacka|Terhi Panula|Mikko Pörhölä|Kreeta Salminen|Hannele Hakola|Noora Lintukangas|Max Vannasmaa|Salli Siivonen|Mika Räinä|Salina Tyynelä|Kimi
keywords: finland|northern finland|repressed memory|loss of child|loss of a child
title: Syvälle salattu
